snippet: With hours routinely tied up in conference calls, busy professionals are filling the time quietly performing other tasks like cleaning and doing yoga.
abstract: Some professionals while on conference calls from home perform household chores, personal hygiene, online shopping and other activities; some tend animals or scrub floors with mute button pressed.
lead_paragraph: With hours routinely tied up in conference calls, busy professionals are filling the time quietly performing other tasks like cleaning and doing yoga.

headline.main: The Modern Meeting: Call In, Turn Off, Tune Out
headline.print_headline: The Modern Meeting: Call In, Turn Off, Tune Out
